[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@invertase/firestore-stripe-payments](./firestore-stripe-payments.md) &gt; [Price](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.md)

## Price interface

Interface of a Stripe Price object stored in the app database.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Price 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [active](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.active.md) | boolean | Whether the price can be used for new purchases. |
|  [currency](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.currency.md) | string | Three-letter ISO currency code. |
|  [description](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.description.md) | string \| null | A brief description of the price. |
|  [id](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.id.md) | string | Unique Stripe price ID. |
|  [interval\_count](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.interval_count.md) | number \| null | The number of intervals (specified in the [Price.interval](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.interval.md) attribute) between subscription billings. For example, <code>interval=month</code> and <code>interval_count=3</code> bills every 3 months. |
|  [interval](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.interval.md) | "day" \| "month" \| "week" \| "year" \| null | The frequency at which a subscription is billed. One of <code>day</code>, <code>week</code>, <code>month</code> or <code>year</code>. |
|  [product](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.product.md) | string | ID of the Stripe product to which this price is related. |
|  [trial\_period\_days](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.trial_period_days.md) | number \| null | Default number of trial days when subscribing a customer to this price using [trial\_from\_plan](https://stripe.com/docs/api#create_subscription-trial_from_plan)<!-- -->. |
|  [type](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.type.md) | "one\_time" \| "recurring" | One of <code>one_time</code> or <code>recurring</code> depending on whether the price is for a one-time purchase or a recurring (subscription) purchase. |
|  [unit\_amount](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.unit_amount.md) | number \| null | The unit amount in cents to be charged, represented as a whole integer if possible. |
